name: FallingCows
description:
FallingCows:

In FallingCows you play as a cowboy who must finish a parkour while avoiding being killed by cows falling from de sky. Finish the 3 levels to win the game8

Controls:
  • A = move left
  • D = move right
  • W = Jump
  • WW = double jump
Note:

This is my very first game: so please be kind in the commands down below :p
